value.title: Differences between Power BI Apps and Workspaces
value.excerpt: In today's video I am going to show you the difference between Power Bi Apps and workspaces and what do I use them for. I also explain why I think that workspaces are too messy for the business user or data consumer. value.excerpt: You can turn on audit logs in Power BI to monitor what users are doing in Power BI.
